hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does this project fulfill a real need users have?
Is the project more than just another generic social/mobile/local app? Does it do something entirely novel, or at least take a fresh approach to an old problem?
Does this project provide a direction for moving forward with this idea? Have we uncovered/made progress on the major technical cost/hurdles?

hackathon-description-header: What aren't we doing that we should be doing?
